item.title: Why Introverts Are Remarkably Effective Leaders, Backed by Organizational Science
item.description: Think ‘effective leader’ and you probably think extrovert. But research shows introverts are just as effective.

item.title: AI Isn’t Coming for Your Job—It’s Coming for Your Whole Org Chart
item.description: Here’s how to make yourself irreplaceable.

item.title: 3 Surprising Takeaways From Klarna’s Billion-Dollar IPO Filing
item.description: The company is promoting its use of AI, while warning investors its bet on the tech could be risky.

item.title: The Fed Looks More Late Than Ever as the Government Says Nearly 1 Million Jobs Never Existed Last Year
item.description: Job growth was stagnant far before President Trump’s tariffs started.

item.title: What a WhatsApp Advertisement Can Teach You About Business
item.description: Adam Scott and Adam Brody star in a new WhatsApp campaign. Here’s what’s brilliant about the ad—and what business owners should learn from it.
